DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical study is to determine the maximum tolerated dose (MTD) of 3-dimensional conformal radiation therapy (3-DCRT)/intensity modulated radiation therapy (IMRT) for locally advanced hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC).
DOC.brief_title: Radiation Dose Escalation Study for Advanced Liver Cancer
